mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishList(userId, movieId, wish) values(#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{wish})
mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(movie SYS_C008625) */ m.movieId, m.movieTitle, m.cate1,m.cate2, m.movieDate, m.movieCheck, m.poster FROM movie m JOIN wishList w ON m.movieId = w.movieId ORDER BY w.id desc, m.movieDate desc
